data.comment: The match has started at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke at Opel Arena.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Schalke.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Throw-in Schalke.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jonathan Michael Burkardt for Mainz who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 6, Penalty! Patrick Ittrich points to the spot, great chance for Mainz...
Jonathan Michael Burkardt for Mainz is back on the field again.
It's advantage Mainz in Mainz as Daniel Brosinski scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 7, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Mainz close to the penalty box.
Patrick Ittrich awards the home team a throw-in.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Schalke in the half of Mainz.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Schalke throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 15, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
So close for Schalke as Mark Uth's shot comes back off the post.
Schalke's Ozan Kabak breaks free at Opel Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Schalke's Bastian Oczipka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mainz defender.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Mainz.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Mark Uth gets his shot on target but fails to score for Schalke.
Mainz drives forward and Edimilson Fernandes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 25, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Mainz.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 27, Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Mainz push forward at Opel Arena and Jean-Philippe Mateta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
At Opel Arena, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 29, Mainz pushes forward through Jean-Philippe Mateta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Schalke throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke drive forward but Kilian Ludewig is judged offside.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke just outside Mainz's area.
Mark Uth gets an equalizer for Schalke. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 37, Free kick Mainz.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Schalke's Kilian Ludewig has run offside.
In the minute 40, Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Mainz needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 43, Mainz have a goal kick.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Mainz have been awarded a penalty in Mainz...
Ozan Kabak is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Mainz.
In Mainz Mainz drive forward through Jean-Philippe Mateta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Opel Arena.
Jean-Philippe Mateta smashes in a penalty at Opel Arena. The score is now 2-1.
The second half has started at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke at Opel Arena.
In the minute 46, Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a first substitution, with Levin Oztunali replacing Daniel Brosinski.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Patrick Ittrich signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to Mainz's area.
Can Schalke capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
In the minute 48, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 51, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 54, Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Patrick Ittrich awards Schalke a goal kick.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 55, Schalke to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Jonathan Michael Burkardt of Mainz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Mainz throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Important block from the Schalke defence as Jean-Paul Boetius fires in a strike for Mainz.
In the minute 60, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
In Mainz Mainz attack through Jeremiah St. Juste. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
In the minute 61, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Schalke.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Can Bozdogan is on a sub for Alessandro Schopf for Schalke.
In the minute 64, Free kick Mainz.
Danny Latza (Mainz) gets booked by Patrick Ittrich, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Schalke are pushing forward but Goncalo Paciencia's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Karim Onisiwo is replacing Jonathan Michael Burkardt for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
In the minute 68, Schalke have a goal kick.
Patrick Ittrich awards Schalke a goal kick.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Mark Uth for Schalke gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Kilian Ludewig with Steven Skrzybski.
The away team have replaced Amine Harit with Benito Raman. This is the third substitution made today by Manuel Baum.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Goncalo Paciencia (Schalke) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jean-Philippe Mateta for Mainz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Schalke at Opel Arena.
In the minute 79, Pierre Kunde is replacing Leandro Martins for the home team.
Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's fourth substitution at Opel Arena with Dong Won Ji replacing Jean-Philippe Mateta.
Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia breaks free at Opel Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 81, Patrick Ittrich awards Mainz a goal kick.
Schalke make their fourth substitution with Vedad Ibisevic replacing Ozan Kabak.
An unfortunate own goal by Jeremiah St. Juste makes the score 2-2.
In the minute 84, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Matija Nastasic (Schalke) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Jean-Paul Boetius with Robin Quaison.
Schalke are coming forward and Mark Uth gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Mainz have a goal kick.
Mainz's Robin Quaison gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Patrick Ittrich blows against Schalke's Mark Uth for offside.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Mainz.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Mainz.
Mark Uth of Schalke gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Free kick Mainz.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Mainz throw-in in Schalke's half.
Goal kick for Schalke at Opel Arena.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
